tests_run: uv run pytest -q tests/test_prd_task_lookup.py tests/test_loop_targeting.py tests/test_harness.py tests/test_cli_harness.py tests/test_cli_mode.py tests/test_completion.py tests/test_yaml_tracker.py tests/test_github_issues.py tests/test_trackers_beads.py
human_verification: Reviewed strict vs override target behavior, live harness completion/aggregate semantics, new CLI/completion flags, and full test pass status.
notes: Implemented explicit task targeting and resolution plumbing across loop/trackers/PRD; added live harness execution mode with strict/override controls; expanded docs/completions and tests for regression safety.
